subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: he head of the French antidoping agency confirmed that the German rider Stefan Schumacher and the Italians Riccardo Ricco and Leonardo Piepoli had tested positive for an advanced version of the blood-booster EPO.
